name: The Billion Halloween
description:
Julie is determined to beat the devil before Halloween ends. Along the way she will make choices that will impact the outcome of her story.

Controls:

Z - Red Gem - Rapid-fire attack
X - Green Gem - Area of effect explosion
C - Yellow Gem - Nuke the entire screen.

I've seen some people say that the game is unplayable due to the scrolling window when using the up and down keys. If that's the case, then you should use the full screen button in the bottom right corner to fix that.
